name: Too Many Cooks (Division PLUS Games)
description:
Follow the adventure of Adam Escargot, his loyal cook companion and the one lady that tips really well.  I mean, you don't get many that tip 20% these days. 

On a quest to satisfy the curiosity of a local tavern patron, Escargot sets off on a journey across the Spiral Isles to pick up his new shipment of exotic noodles.  Unseen forces plot against young Escargot, mired by the misery of botched paperwork and those who would do him harm.

Features
  • 3 Playable Characters
  • 9 Maps to Explore
  • 15+ Food Based Battlers created by Thalzon @ RpgMakerWeb.com
  • 5+ Musical Scores by YouFulca @ Wingless-Saraph.net
  • 15-25 minutes of gameplay
